page.title: 10MADELEY STAFFS : MORE CLUBS
page.content: 1 men's & 2 ladies'bowls teams operate from the Working Men's Club.At the Swan public house,2fishing clubs hold their meetings:Madeley Anglers & Madeley Sea Anglers. A football club,Madeley White Star,has its own pitch & hopes to raise enough money to build a club house & changing rooms.The cricket club owns its pitch and pavilion at Lycett,and plays in the Staffordshire league.Its future seems secure. For those who feel no longer young or fit enough to join the clubs mentioned, there is a pensioners'club,which meets in the Village Hall,every Tuesday after -noon,when they have tea with friends. The villagers raise money during the year to pay for an annual outing & meal for them.Thus the community is well- provided for;though not everyone wants to belong to an organisation or club.
